mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT a.task_seq, a.department_seq, d.department_name, a.task_title , t.template_seq, t.template_task_round FROM task a JOIN department d ON a.department_seq = d.department_seq JOIN template t ON a.template_seq = t.template_seq JOIN employee e ON d.department_seq = e.department_seq

SELECT DISTINCT a.task_seq, a.task_title, a.task_type, t.template_seq, a.task_content, t.template_task_round, t.template_end_at, f.file_seq, f.file_name, f.file_url FROM task a JOIN department d ON d.department_seq = a.department_seq JOIN employee e ON d.department_seq = e.department_seq JOIN template t ON t.template_seq = a.template_seq JOIN onboarding_status os ON os.template_seq = t.template_seq JOIN file f ON f.task_seq = a.task_seq WHERE os.employee_seq = #{employee_seq} AND a.task_seq = #{task_seq}
SELECT task_seq, task_content FROM task WHERE task_type = 'GROUP'

SELECT DISTINCT a.task_seq, a.task_type, a.task_title, a.task_content, t.template_seq, t.template_end_at, t.template_task_round, tl.eval_list_content, tl.eval_list_score, f.file_seq, f.file_name, f.file_url FROM task a JOIN template t ON t.template_seq = a.template_seq JOIN department d ON a.department_seq = d.department_seq JOIN employee e ON d.department_seq = e.department_seq JOIN file f ON f.task_seq = a.task_seq LEFT JOIN ( SELECT m.mentor_seq, m.mentee_seq FROM mentoring m ) mt ON e.employee_seq = mt.mentor_seq LEFT JOIN ( SELECT e.employee_seq AS mentee_seq, e.employee_name AS mentee_name FROM employee e ) em ON mt.mentee_seq = em.mentee_seq LEFT JOIN eval_list tl ON a.task_seq = tl.task_seq WHERE e.employee_seq = #{employee_seq} AND e.employee_role = "mentor" AND a.task_seq = #{task_seq}

SELECT a.task_seq, d.department_seq, d.department_name, a.template_seq, t.template_task_round, a.task_title, a.task_content FROM task a JOIN department d ON a.department_seq = d.department_seq JOIN template t ON a.template_seq = t.template_seq WHERE a.task_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{taskContent}, '%') OR a.task_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{taskContent}, '%')

SELECT tg.task_group_seq, gm.group_member_seq, gm.employee_seq, e.employee_name FROM group_member gm JOIN task_group tg ON tg.task_group_seq = gm.task_group_seq JOIN employee e ON e.employee_seq = gm.employee_seq WHERE tg.task_group_seq = #{taskGroupSeq}

SELECT DISTINCT a.task_seq, a.department_seq, d.department_name, a.task_title , t.template_seq, t.template_task_round FROM task a JOIN department d ON a.department_seq = d.department_seq JOIN template t ON a.template_seq = t.template_seq JOIN employee e ON d.department_seq = e.department_seq WHERE a.department_seq = ( SELECT department_seq FROM employee WHERE employee_seq = #{employee_seq} )

SELECT t.task_seq, tm.template_seq, dm.department_seq, t.task_title, dm.department_name, tm.template_type, t.task_type, t.task_content, tm.template_task_round, tm.template_end_at, tm.template_url_name, el.eval_list_seq, el.eval_list_content, el.eval_list_score, ei.eval_ind_seq, ei.eval_ind_content, f.file_seq, f.file_name, f.file_url FROM task t LEFT JOIN template tm ON tm.template_seq = t.task_seq LEFT JOIN department dm ON dm.department_seq = t.department_seq LEFT JOIN eval_list el ON el.task_seq = t.task_seq LEFT JOIN eval_ind ei ON ei.eval_ind_seq = el.eval_ind_seq LEFT JOIN file f ON f.task_seq = t.task_seq WHERE t.task_seq = #{task_seq};
